name: Hokkyokuguma's Journey
description:
Welcome to Hokkyokuguma's Journey!

Join Hokkyokuguma on his journey to return to his igloo and picking up food on the way.

This is a relaxing 2D retro game made for GAMEBOY systems.

Controls

use A/D keys to move 

use space key to jump

Team HEHE:

Hetarth Thakor - Project Manager & Gameplay/UI Programmer & SFX

(https://gd04hetarth.itch.io/)

Henrique Zanchet - 2D Artist, Level & Gameplay Designer

(https://hzanchet.itch.io/)
